issues.description: Code inconsistencies: Multiple duplicate functions (reset(), captureCurrentFrame/stopFrameSampling undefined)
issues.impact: App compilation failure, AR scanning non-functional

issues.description: Undefined variables: sampledFrames used but never defined
Hardcoded dimensions in processRoomData - not using actual scan data
issues.impact: All estimates will use 10x12x8 room regardless of actual size

issues.description: Firebase configuration missing: Service account project_id not configured
issues.impact: Complete backend startup failure - no API endpoints accessible

issues.description: 4 critical security vulnerabilities in npm dependencies
issues.impact: Production security risk - requires npm audit fix

issues.description: Database is empty - no schema or seed data loaded
issues.impact: No geographic pricing, no assembly data - complete system non-functional

AR-002: Undefined variables (sampledFrames) causing runtime crashes
AR-003: Hardcoded room dimensions - accuracy compromised
